original_text: So Saul and the servant travelled through the hill country of Ephraim. They went across Shalisha region. But they did not find the donkeys there. Then they went to Shaalim region. The donkeys were not there either. They travelled through all the tribe of Benjamin's land. They still did not find the donkeys anywhere.
korean_text: 그가 에브라임 산지와 살리사 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하고 사알림 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 그 곳에는 없었고 베냐민 사람의 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: So Saul and the servant travelled
through the hill country of Ephraim
But they did not find the donkeys there
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그곳에서 나귀를 찾지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they went to Shaalim region
The donkeys were not there either
They travelled through all the tribe of Benjamin's land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 베냐민 지파의 모든 땅을 여행했습니다

sentences.original_text: They still did not find the donkeys anywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어디에서도 여전히 나귀를 찾지 못했습니다
